titleStmt.title: Some of the most material errors and omissions in the late printed tryals of the Romish priests at the Old-Baily, Jan. 17, 1679
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Lionel, d. 1710.

notesStmt.note: Includes testimony given by Lionel Anderson.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
